company.name: Gotadi
company.description:
Gotadi Branch - Hoang Gia Travel And Air Service Joint Stock Company

Gotadi.com is the first online travel booking system in Vietnam providing full automatic booking and payment feature for airlines ticket, hotel and tour. 

Gotadi.com is the first booking system integrated travel information feature for traveler. 

Gotadi.com is an airline ticket agent, which provides inbound and outbound tour for individual and organization.
